name: Rats Paper Scissors
description:
In the year 2160, on a faraway space shuttle, rodents battle over their ultimate fate... and for fun

Featuring 3 realistic rodent hand movements

Controls:

Left click - Select move, Restart game

Credits:

Game by: XxDA_AMONGUS_IMPOSTORxX

Mouse hand movement images by: Milad Naghizadeh, Majid H.Mohajerani, Ian Q.Whishaw

Rat gifs by Unknown

Sound effects from Windows 3.1 and Link: The Faces of Evil
